pullrequest.title: Implement generation of XML Schema files (issue #2)

content.raw:
Here we go. Thanks very much for finishing the issue guys. Santa will be proud of you.

 - [linux run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker/41/) success!
 - [homebrew run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/27/) waiting ..
 - I'm fixing windows but it will take another PR to support our current building method.
content.html:
